overview: Having taken on the Skaterboys, those hot and horny Chavs turn their attention to the so-called menace of our streets – the Hoodies! When they’re not mugging old ladies and being chased by the police, these bad-boy Hoodies are clearly after one thing and one thing only: hard cock! And the bigger the better. What’s more, they don’t care where they get it – both indoors and out! Lucky for them that the Chavs are more than willing (and equipped) to satisfy ...
title: Chavs vs Hoodies
